column1: Kata Robata////If you are looking for more than just great sashimi and sushi
column2: Kata Robata has great options for hot dishes
column4: noodles and even dessert. I've been here multiple times and the best bargain is during their Happy Hour. You can try a lot of great appetizers for around $6 and beers for $3. I also recommend the tonkatsu ramen here for lunch but I haven't gotten it in a while since Jinya opened so near me.
